reservations.name: Cozy Beachfront Condo
reservations.description: A beachfront condo with stunning views, close to local attractions.

transportation.name: Economy Car Rental
transportation.description: Economy car rental for easy transportation around the area.

vacation.climate: Mild and sunny, perfect for outdoor activities.

day1.day_description: Arrive in New Orleans, explore the vibrant French Quarter and enjoy local cuisine.

activities.title: Cafe Du Monde
activities.description: Famous for its beignets and café au lait.

activities.title: Cochon Butcher
activities.description: A casual sandwich shop known for its Cajun-style meats.

activities.title: French Quarter Walking Tour
activities.description: A guided tour showcasing the history and architecture of the French Quarter.

activities.title: Steamboat Natchez Cruise
activities.description: Cruise along the Mississippi River on a historic steamboat.

day2.day_description: Explore New Orleans’ cultural side, visiting museums and enjoying live music.

activities.title: Mother's Restaurant
activities.description: Homey spot known for po'boys and Southern comfort food.

activities.title: Commander's Palace
activities.description: Upscale dining with Creole fare in a historic Victorian mansion.

activities.title: National WWII Museum
activities.description: A comprehensive museum dedicated to World War II history.

activities.title: Frenchmen Street Live Music
activities.description: Experience local music in bars and venues along Frenchmen Street.

day3.day_description: Visit local parks and enjoy the natural beauty of New Orleans.

activities.title: Willie Mae's Scotch House
activities.description: Famous for its fried chicken, a local favorite.

activities.title: Jacques-Imo's Cafe
activities.description: A lively spot offering innovative takes on New Orleans cuisine.

activities.title: City Park
activities.description: A large urban park with botanical gardens and walking paths.

activities.title: Audubon Zoo
activities.description: A beautiful zoo with a wide variety of animals and habitats.
